name: Buried Memories
description:
You wake up in a room unable to remember who you are or how you got there. Look around for a way to escape or possibly uncover a path that can take you further into the house. Perhaps you may find out who lives here, and what they want with you.

       There are four total endings to the narrative of Buried Memories. Each one is unlocked by escaping from each room, and subsequent rooms can only be accessed by escaping from the previous room through an alternate method.

Credits
